p: The instrDef element can be used to record MIDI instrument names or numbers using the@midi.instrnameand@midi.instrnumattributes. The@midi.instrnameattribute must contain an instrument name from the list provided by the data.MIDINAMES data type. By default, data.MIDINAMES contains General MIDI Instrument designations. The@midi.instrnumis provided for those cases when an instrument number is needed. It must contain valid MIDI values; that is, 0-127. In these cases, a General MIDI Instrument name is redundant.
